summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GuessIt football prediction platform. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI loaded correctly with GUESSIT header, promo banner, match cards, league filters, theme toggle, and proper navigation. Minor WebSocket connection issues detected but fallback polling works. Authentication pages render correctly with Google OAuth integration.

integration_issues.issue: WebSocket connection to '/api/ws/matches' fails with 'WebSocket is closed before the connection is established'

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint returns 'GuessIt API is running'
Football API integration - 8 competitions and 124 matches retrieved
User registration with email/password works (creates user, sets session)
User login with email/password works (validates credentials, creates session)
Predictions API endpoints return correct responses
Frontend loads with GUESSIT header and branding
Promo banner displays 'Win Bragging Rights!' with 'Join Now' CTA
League filter chips are visible and clickable (UCL, Premier League, La Liga, etc.)
Login page renders with Google OAuth and email/password form
Register page renders with proper form and Google OAuth integration
Match cards display live matches with teams, scores, and prediction options
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix WebSocket connection issue for live match updates. The WebSocket endpoint /api/ws/matches is failing to establish connection, though fallback polling mechanism works. All other functionality is working correctly.
